about_the_game:
Nyanroo is a new platform game that pays homage to the 16 bit era.
Choosen by a magic cloth you must face a gang of evil dogs trying to conquer the world.
Gather different abilities with the help of the Power Yarns scattered through the world to slash and pounce your way through 14 stages and 7 amazing bosses.


STORY

A long time ago, the world was consumed by evil. to put an end to that, the gods themselves created a living magic cloth designed to give power to the one who wears it, the cloth searched for a warrior with a good heart and with him they banished evil and with time the legends gave birth to what we call today as super heroes!

But the story starts when a super villain and his pet dog are about to defeat the current hero, seeing his imminent defeat the hero decides to sacrifice himself in order to defeat the villain.

The dog survives and the livin cloth chooses the cat as the new hero !
Now you start the journey while the evil dog Barkrow gather the help of the most powerful dogs in the world to defeat Nyanroo and conquer the world!

Choosen by a magic cloth you must face a gang of evil dogs trying to conquer the world.
Gather different abilities with the help of the Power Yarns scattered through the world to slash and pounce your way through 14 stages and 7 amazing bosses.

name: Nyanroo The Supercat Demo Version

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 or later compatible.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 or later compatible.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 or later compatible.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 or later compatible.

Gather different abilities with the help of the Power Yarns scattered through the world to slash and pounce your way through 14 stages and 7 amazing bosses.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
